name: UMaterialInstanceConstant
doc:
Material Instances may be used to change the appearance of a material without incurring an expensive recompilation of the material.
General modification of the material cannot be supported without recompilation, so the instances are limited to changing the values of
predefined material parameters. The parameters are statically defined in the compiled material by a unique name, type and default value.

PhysMaterialMask: Physical material mask to use for this graphics material. Used for sounds, effects etc.

methods.name: GetScalarParameterValue
methods.doc: Get the scalar (float) parameter value from an MIC

methods.name: GetTextureParameterValue
methods.doc: Get the MIC texture parameter value

methods.name: GetVectorParameterValue
methods.doc: Get the MIC vector parameter value

methods.name: SetNaniteOverrideMaterial
methods.doc: Set an override material which will be used when rendering with nanite.
